description.value:
Very Heretical, and instantly recognisable as blasphemous to any loyal imperial citizen. Provides +20 to Charm Tests with heretical individuals.

Requirements

A Great way of getting killed if displayed openly in Imperial Territory. Heretical

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
